title: [DarkDerma] League of Legends - Zed Montage #2

embed.description: Thanks for watching my second Zed Montage. Lee sin Montage coming soon :D Like and Subscribe and leave some feedback thanks :D

body:
Hey Guys I've uploaded my second Zed Montage please watch like and subscribe.
I know its not the greatest but I will be uploading a Lee Sin Montage by Next week :D
[DarkDerma] League of Legends - Zed Montage #2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1LszM72VN2I

replies.body: No one cares about your zed montage you made in normals. Do a ranked montage and people might care, even then you're still just silver. I could make a montage of me ulting 1v1 unranked plebs in normals all day long....

Hey SENROTH,
Thanks for the feedback Some of those clips where from ranked and why are you saying "even then you're just silver". Silver isn't too bad considering you are bronze 5 Lol {{summoner:14}}

> [{quoted}](name=DarkDerma,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=wFuhHHWc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-07T10:16:27.387+0000)
>
> Hey SENROTH,
> Thanks for the feedback Some of those clips where from ranked and why are you saying "even then you're just silver". Silver isn't too bad considering you are bronze 5 Lol {{summoner:14}}

My rank doesn't affect the quality of your video at all.... but sick burn bro. People still aren't interested in watching you 1v1 people as zed in normals. Here's some more constructive feedback for you.

Overalll your editting is pretty high quality. I like that aspect, but the plays you're highlighting are not exciting.

1st kill, 2v1 double kil early lvl vs a teemo and zyra... in a normal game... who cares?
2nd kill - ulting the zyra thats already behind 1v1...who cares?
3rd kill - ult the same zyra again (She's now 2 lvls behind) 1v1 ... who cares?
4th kill - ulted a lvl 6 jungle teemo as lvl 9 zed .. really who cares?
5th kill - another 1v1 ult on zyra
6th kill - another 1v1 on teemo, this time you didn't ult! You were lvl 11 him lvl 7 ... he nearly killed you
INTERLUDE showing 101K points for zed
7th kill - simple 1v1 vs underlvld teemo
8th kill - a 1v1 vs Zyra, you're fed and ahead, with ult and hp but you barely get away with your life, and thats only because Zyra didn't shoot you with her spike thing. Embarrassing.
9th kill - finally what appears to be a ranked game, but its just a 1v1 vs yasuo.
10th Kill - for something different you've ulted and killed Yas 1v1..... wow the plays are so stronk!
11th kill - music change for the 1v1 ez, but thats ok cos its only the intro to the chase scene - +1 this was actually funny and fun to watch. GW.
12th kill - the kill on Xin while they take your nexus and you lose the game. - at least you didn't show only wins....


TLDR - one normal game of you killing the same two scrubs over and over, one ranked game showing 1v1 plays, an escape and your loss.

Great editting, bad plays, montage the shit out of some triple kills and pentas etc.

I've seen high elo montages where they put simple kills but if thats the problem then I can put Much better plays just watch out for my Lee Sin montage. Also my first zed montage features a couple of triple kills and outplays so you can watch that here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kEnWVUq5-V0
What you said first wasnt really constructive but ur second comment was valid enough for me to take seriously so thanks for the feedback :)
p.s the kill on xin... we won that :P

You are in BRONZE 5.

Ok?

It makes YOU look bad if you hate comment it.

> even then you're still just silver

Coming from B5, ok.
